textos_fuente.text: Brothers Kershner Brewing Co. | Private Event | Skippack, PA, USA top of page brothers kershner brewing co. brewed with love. shared with all. LOCATIONS Brothers Kershner Brewing Co. Taproom Brothers on the Brandywine Beer Garden The Barrel by BK - NOW OPEN! MENUS Brothers Kershner Brewery Beer Garden The Barrel EVENTS Private Events Brewery Beer Garden Vendor Events CONTACT Employment Deliver to my door Contact Us BROTHERS KERSHNER BREWING CO. WELCOME TO Brewery & Taproom Where it's all made! Brothers kershner brewery & taproom is located in the heart of skippack, pa. ​We operate as a taproom serving beer, wine, cocktails and mocktails! You can also BYOF[food].  ​​ Seasonal Beer Garden Brothers on the brandywine operates as a seasonal beer garden. We are open every sunday at 1pm from april - october. ​ Our sunday funday never dissapoints with live music, food trucks, beer, wine and good vibes! ​ Follow us for our special events! Taproom & Restaurant NOW OPEN! ​ our taproom and restaurant located in avondale, pa! Yes, we make wine too! Brothers kershner cellars was created to serve additional pallets for all our wine lovers! ​ We offer a variety of reds, whites and of course rose! You can find our wines at all of our locations. Stay in the know! First Name Last Name Email Message Submit Thanks for submitting! HOME Call us! Brothers Kershner Brewing Co. skippack, pa Brothers On The Brandywine Beer Garden email us! coatesville, pa The Barrel Restaurant & taproom work with us avondale, pa bottom of page

Dees Brothers Brewery | Craft Beer Brewer in Sanford FL Skip to content Home About Menus Food Menu Beer Store Contact Menu Home About Menus Food Menu Beer Store Contact Directions Craft Beer brewer in Sanford FL Years in the making We believe there's a beer out there for everyone, and we brew them. We are two brothers that have been home-brewing for over eight years. Now with a list of tried and true recipes, we are venturing forth to join the Central Florida craft community and share our beer. After three years of searching, we found our spot. A 100-year-old building located in the historic district of downtown Sanford, Florida. We are still in the planning stages so be sure to follow us on social media to stay connected with our progress or for any announcements. Big things are coming! We don't focus on one particular type or style of beer. We Love All! Instead we brew beer for many reasons. Some are brewed because it goes well with experiences like pairing with food, watching sports, being outdoors, or just enjoying sitting in your favorite chair or bar stool. Others are brewed because they were inspired by a clever name we came up with. Some are brewed in honor of people, places, or events about which we care. Some we just wanted to see what would happen. Whatever the muse for one of our beers, You’ll be able to find a good one that inspires you. Beer Menu Reach us through 210 Magnolia Ave Sanford, FL 32771 info@deesbrosbrew.com GEt social with us Dees Brothers Brewery Deesbrosbrew Send us a Message Send Message © 2022 Copyright Dees Bros Brewery. Dees Brothers Brewery: Brewery In Historic Downtown Sanford Home About Menus Food Menu Beer Store Contact Menu Home About Menus Food Menu Beer Store Contact Directions Craft Beer Craft Food Dees Brothers Brewery is a full brewing experience here in Historic Downtown Sanford that offers our community craft beer, lounge, arcade games, and unique dishes. Directions Welcome! Full Brewing Experience Dees Brothers Brewery is the product of a passion for brewing great beer. What started as a humble homebrew project in our garage eventually shifted to a full-operation local brew and lounge in Historic Sanford. Our Story shop Dees Bros Brewery Souvenirs Visit our local brewery for neat nick-nacks and apparel to gift to loved ones or yourself! Our store has branded growlers, koozies, hats, and more! Directions Visit Online Store community Weekly Events Our brewery intends to bring our community together for a unique and unforgettable experience, hosting weekly events where you can have fun and have quality craft beer and dishes. View Events DEES FOOD MENU Food Menu DEES BROS BEERS Beer Menu WE ARE BREWERS B uild Relationships r adiate love E volve & grow W ork with quality E ducate & art R ecognize demand s implicity Sanford's Comfiest Lounge No kidding! We focused our interior efforts to provide you with the comfiest lounge area you can find in Sanford, Florida. So come to Dee's Bros Brewery to relax & unwind with on-site craft beers, delicious food, arcades, & live performances! Sanford's Comfiest Lounge No kidding! we focused our interior efforts  to provide you the comfiest lounge area you can find in Sanford, Florida. Come to Dee's Bros Brewery to relax & unwind with on-site craft beers, delicious food, arcades, & live performances! Live Performance & Upclass Comfort Food At Dees Bros Brewery, we consistently bring you live performances on the weekends & quality comfort food every day. Visit anytime & get the Dee's Bros experience. Live Performance & Upclass Comfort Food At Dees Bros Brewery we want to consistently bring you live performances on the weekends & quality comfort food every day. Come in anytime & relax so you can unwind. Arcade & Brews As a favorite brewery in Sanford, we have always wanted to provide a place for anyone to come & hang out with family & friends. When you come to Dee's Bros, we want you to feel at home. Our retro arcades are free & our drinks are Sanford-crafted beers. Arcade & Brews As the newest sanford brewery - we have always wanted to provide a place for anyone to come & hangout with their family & friends so we want you to feel at home. Our retro arcades are free & our drinks are sanford crafted beers. Come hangout at the best craft beer you. can find in Sanford. Dees Menu: Pair Your Delicious Beer With Our Comfort Selection Of Food Items Skip to content Home About Menus Food Menu Beer Store Contact Menu Home About Menus Food Menu Beer Store Contact Directions DEES FOOD MENU​ Pair your beautifully crafted beer With our comfort selection of Food Food Stuff! Serving Boar’s Head meats & cheese and all our bread is vegan and baked locally at the Old Hearth Bread Company. We also keep vegan cheese, bacon & sour cream all available upon request. All of our menu items can be made gluten-free upon request.
